headline.main: LEHMAN ASKS SPEED ON FUND FOR UNRRA; Urgency of Relief' Problem Impels Call for Prompt Voting of Cash for Task CLOSING SESSION TODAY Monnet Says France Will Pay for All Supplies and Calls for Haste in Shipments

lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, N.J., Nov. 30 -- Director General Herbert H. Lehman of the United Nations Relief and Rehabilitation Administration told a press conference today that he hoped Congress and the legislative bodies of other nations whose approval is required would act as quickly as possible to appropriate funds with which UNRRA can operate.
abstract: UNRRA: Lehman asks speed in legis bodies funds approval, press conf; Acheson describes 1st council session to House Foreign Affairs Com members; 4 big coms, supplies, financial control, Eur and Far East organized; J Monnet says France will pay for all supplies obtained; asks speed for prompt relief, press conf
